akn:content.akn:p:
§ 44739. Pets on airplanes(a) Prohibition.—It shall be unlawful for any person to place a live animal in an overhead storage compartment of an aircraft operated under part 121 of title 14, Code of Federal Regulations.
(b) Civil Penalty.—The Administrator may impose a civil penalty under section 46301 for each violation of this section.
(Added Pub. L. 115–254, div. B, title IV, § 417(a), Oct. 5, 2018, 132 Stat. 3334.)
(a) It shall be unlawful for any person to place a live animal in an overhead storage compartment of an aircraft operated under part 121 of title 14, Code of Federal Regulations.
(b) The Administrator may impose a civil penalty under section 46301 for each violation of this section.
